item.title: pytorch tutorial
item.author: 作者
item.description: tutorial 地址: pytorch: Training a Classifier. 当使用新的数据集进行测试时, 出现的问题及解决的方法. Problem 1 error: 1 RuntimeError: invalid argument 0: Sizes of tensors must match except in dimension 0. Got 484 and 549 in dimension 2 at /pytorch/aten/src/TH/generic/THTensorMath.cpp:3616 location: 1 images, labels = data_iter.next() solution: 1 2 数
